actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to transfer certain lands administered by him to the State of California.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Interior to transfer those lands known as the California Desert Proposal to the State of California for use as a State park.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to transfer certain lands administered by him to the State of California.
